text: "Hello Me" is a song by the Australian singer Vanessa Amorosi, released on 6 September 2019 as the second single from her fifth studio album, Back to Love. Amorosi performed the song live on Sunrise on 9 September 2019. Amorosi said the song is a "raw, intimate song about setting boundaries and making choices". ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australia Digital Tracks (ARIA) | 37 |} ==References== Category:2019 singles Category:Vanessa Amorosi songs Category:Songs written by Vanessa Amorosi Category:Songs written by Aleena Gibson
title: Hello Me
